title: Pennylane wants to overhaul the accounting tech stack in France - TechCrunch
content: Pennylane wants to overhaul the accounting tech stack in France  TechCrunch
description: French startup Pennylane has raised a $57 million Series B round (€50 million) from existing investors, such as Sequoia Capital, Global Founders Capital and Partech. The startup wants to replace legacy accounting solutions in France — and in Europe. If you’re an accountant, you might be familiar wi…
